description: The RestoreDomain command automatically request a restore at the respective registry. The processing depends on the respective TLD/ccTLD / registry and varies from realtime up to 3 working days.
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: The renewal mode of the domain after it has been restored
The account in which the domain will be located after the restore
To restore e.g. a premium domain name, the domain CLASS needs to be provided
Order action:CREATE - create a restore orderREPLACE - replace a restore orderUPDATE - update a restore order
